Package edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_results.util

Class RaceTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ncsu.csc216.wolf_results.util.RaceTime

  • public class RaceTime
extends java.lang.Object
    RaceTime represents a race time in the following format: hh:mm:ss, where hours may be listed as one digit or many digits with leading zeros and minutes and seconds are always two digits between 0 and 59 (inclusive).
    Author:
    Bilal Mohamad, Marwah Mahate

    • Constructor Detail

      • RaceTime

        public RaceTime​(int hours,
                int minutes,
                int seconds)
        Constructs a RaceTime object using 3 integers: hours, minutes, and seconds.
        Parameters:
        hours - The hours of the race time
        minutes - The minutes of the race time
        seconds - The seconds of the race time
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if hours is negative or minutes or seconds are not in between 0-59 (inclusive)

      • RaceTime

        public RaceTime​(java.lang.String time)
        Constructs a RaceTime object using a String of the time in the format hh:mm:ss
        Parameters:
        time - a string of the race time in the format hh:mm:ss
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if time is not in the correct format (hh:mm:ss), hh is negative, or mm or ss are not in between 0 and 59 (inclusive)

      • compareTo

        public int compareTo​(RaceTime other)
        Compares different race times based on their total time
        Parameters:
        other - the other RaceTime used for comparison
        Returns:
        0 if the race times are equal 1 if this race time is greater than the parameter race time -1 if this race time is less than the parameter race time
